article_title: Super Bowl Ads, Could Google Maps End Poverty?

article_metadata.description: The Super Bowl is just days away, and with the exception of weather predictions, everyone is gearing up for the ads that will debut on Sunday. FORBES writers report on the worst ads, the costs and if its worth it to include a celebrity appearance. see photosClick for full photo gallery: [...]
article_metadata.author: Emily Canal
